name: B2B Services - Lead Gen Help
description: For B2B service companies (consulting, professional services) needing leads

target_persona.company_type: Consulting, Professional Services, IT Services, Accounting, Legal, HR Services

sequence.body_template:
{firstName},

Most {industry} firms I talk to have the same problem: referrals are great, but unpredictable.

One month you're slammed. The next, crickets.

We've been helping B2B service companies build a predictable pipeline through targeted cold email outreach — 100 personalized emails per week to your exact ICP.

The result? Clients typically book 5-10 qualified calls monthly, creating a steady stream of opportunities instead of waiting for the phone to ring.

Worth a quick conversation to see if it fits {company}?

Caesar
Founder, Caesar's Legions
sequence.notes: Hits the 'feast or famine' pain directly. Shows understanding of their world.

sequence.body_template:
{firstName},

Wanted to follow up with a quick example:

A consulting firm we work with was 100% referral-dependent. After 2 months of targeted outreach, they had 8 new discovery calls booked — and closed 2 new clients at $15K each.

Now they're not panicking when referrals slow down.

Is predictable pipeline something {company} is thinking about?

Caesar
sequence.notes: Specific case study with numbers. Ends with question to get response.

sequence.body_template:
{firstName},

I know timing isn't always right, so I won't keep bugging you.

If building a more predictable pipeline is on {company}'s radar, I'd love to chat.

If not, just let me know and I'll close your file — no hard feelings.

Caesar
sequence.notes: Clean breakup with direct question. High reply rate due to 'close your file' psychology.
